root.name: Command & Conquer: Red Alert - Counterstrike
root.description: OverviewThe expansion to Command Conquer: Red Alert is full of clandestine activity, new experimental technologies and disavowed tactics. Includes 16 extremely hard single player missions and many new multiplayer maps from the original designers of Command Conquer: Red Alert. World War II really heats up as both sides deploy their strongest weapons against each other in this expansion to Red Alert.Many new units await those who play this expansion including, Tesla Tanks, super soldiers, and dangerous new nuclear technologies. Do you have what it takes to beat these missions which are all harder then the last mission in the Red Alert? Last but not least, experience the hidden Giant Ant missions included in this expansion.
